original_text:
And they sang a new song, saying,
“Worthy are you to take the scroll
    and to open its seals,
for you were slain, and by your blood you ransomed people for God
    from every tribe and language and people and nation,
korean_text: 그들이 새 노래를 불러 이르되 두루마리를 가지시고 그 인봉을 떼기에 합당하시도다 일찍이 죽임을 당하사 각 족속과 방언과 백성과 나라 가운데에서 사람들을 피로 사서 하나님께 드리시고

sentences.original_text: And they sang a new song
Worthy are you to take the scroll
and by your blood you ransomed people for God
sentences.korean_translation: 또 당신의 피로 하나님을 위해 사람들을 속량하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: from every tribe and language and people and nation,
